nodes.text: Obsessed With Star Wars is a book with 2,500 trivia questions, covering each of the six films of the Skywalker Saga, and Expanded Universe events related to individuals, places, and items therein. It features electronic gameplay, via a "scoring module." It can be played on Random or Select question mode.
The title was reissued in paperback on August 4, 2015, nearly seven years after its original release.
According to Benjamin Harper, one or two questions had staff at Lucas Licensing puzzled.[source?]
